channel.title: Posts on The Circled Path
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Circled Path

item.title: init Blog
item.author: s.musap@circledpath.com (Sasha Musap)
item.description: “It’s tempting to linger in this moment, while every possibility still exists. But unless they are collapsed by an observer, they will never be more than possibilities.” Solanum, The Outer Wilds A blog? In 2023? Look, it’s a weird one, I’ll give you that. Especially in an age where it’s probably much easier, more convenient, or more expected to just run a YouTube channel and warble on into the void.
